name: Food Store
description: On this website, user and vendors can sign up and log in. The seller can sell the product and the user can buy the product. The website is fully responsive.

name: Game Zone
description: GameZone Web is an immersive online platform tailored for gaming enthusiasts, providing a central hub for gaming news, community interaction, and an extensive library of games.

name: United A forum type Project
description: UnitedA Forum is a dynamic and inclusive online community designed to bring people together for meaningful discussions, knowledge sharing, and community engagement.

name: Online Group Study
description: CollaborativeLearnHub is a web platform designed to facilitate seamless group study and assignment submission for students. The platform brings together students working on the same assignments, providing a collaborative environment to enhance learning.
